title: Regulation No 118/63/EEC of the Council of 5 November 1963 amending Regulation No 17
header:
REGULATION No 118/63/EEC OF THE COUNCIL  of 5 November 1963  amending Regulation No 17
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY
main_body: In Article 7 (2) of Regulation No 17 for the words "before 1 January 1964" there shall be substituted the words "before 1 January 1967".

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 November 1963.
For the Council
The President
L. de BLOCK  (1) OJ No 157, 30.10.1963, p. 2620/63. (2) OJ No 13, 21.2.1962, p. 204/62.
